results.definition: (superlative of `bad') most wanting in quality or value or condition
examples: the worst player on the team
the worst weather of the year

results.definition: the greatest damage or wickedness of which one is capable
examples: so pure of heart that his worst is another man's best

results.definition: the weakest effort or poorest achievement one is capable of
examples: it was the worst he had ever done on a test
